class_notes: This section is taught within the "Play Fusion" model. A variety of out of class activities are required in lieu of a portion of the in class meetings for instruction see http://recwell.emory.edu/physical_education/play_fusion.html
course_description: A variety of outdoor topics will be introduced, including wilderness therapy, ethics, first aid, shelter, and survival essentials. Class/group projects and day outings will also be included.
